name: HankHang
description:
-----Game Synopsis-----  

HankHang is a small project i made while getting inspired from other grapples like games.

The goal is to reach the end of the road while using your grapple gun to avoide the obstacles that awaits

 -----Controls-----
WASD - Movements

Space - Jump 

Left click - Fire a grappling gun that attach to boxes

This Project is demo only
